data.text:
@GB_Online_ @MoCA_GoI @JM_Scindia Hi Brijesh,
We very sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you on account of unprecedented delay on BLR-AMD flight.
This has happened due to a technical development while the aircraft reached BLR.
(1/2)
